solvents_for_stability_test: Different concentrations of nitric acid solution

gas_adsorption_isotherms.equipment: Hiden Isochema IGA-003 system, Hiden Xemis system

gas_separation_breakthrough_experiment.equipment: Hiden Isochema IGA-003 with ABR attachments and a Hiden Analytical mass spectrometer

release_of_trapped_NO2_and_conversion_to.method: Soaking NO2-loaded MFM-520 in water under stirring in air

inelastic_neutron_scattering_INS.spectrometer: VISION at Spallation Neutron Source, Oak Ridge National Laboratory
inelastic_neutron_scattering_INS.sample_preparation: Degassed at 10-7 mbar at 393 K for 1 day

methods: Perdew-Burke-Ernzerhof (PBE) implementation of the Generalized Gradient Approximation (GGA)

electron_paramagnetic_resonance_spectros.spectrometer: Bruker EMX spectrometer at X-band (~9.5 GHz)
electron_paramagnetic_resonance_spectros.sample_preparation: Activated at 393 K under dynamic vacuum (10-5 mbar) for 12 h
